# Purpose
Assign Index Class when have the input parameters in data file using 
`BioMonTools::assign_IndexClass`.

# Index Name and Class Matrix

The file used to assign INDEX_CLASS by INDEX_NAME is on 
<a href="https://github.com/leppott/BioMonTools/blob/main/inst/extdata/IndexClass.xlsx" target = "_blank">GitHub</a> 
as part of the 
<a href="https://github.com/leppott/BioMonTools" target = "_blank">BioMonTools</a>
package.

# File Inputs
Any file can be run through the file builder but it is suggested the file be 
ready for use in `BioMonTools` or `BCGcalc` functions.  That is, it has the 
columns:

* SITEID

    + Unique site (not sample) identifier.  
    
* INDEX_NAME

    + Index name used to identify the proper index

* INDEX_CLASS

    + Column for the new class assignment.  
    The existing field will be overwritten.
    
* Other Optional Columns

    + Other data (e.g., date, latitude, longitude, elevation, gradient) that 
    may be used to classify SITEID by INDEX_CLASS for the provided INDEX_NAME.
    
The user will be required to identify these fields in their file in the select 
boxes.  The select boxes will contain the columns names of the user file that 
was already uploaded.
